name: Defend The Tower: Castle Defence Element
storyline: Monsters are attacking! Use your tower defense strategy to defeat them, the roads needs to be safe once more.
summary:
Defend The Tower is a free tower defense game for all players. Explore forests, swamps, deserts, snow mountains and lava terrains where you will be facing a war on: orcs, goblins, magic, kingdoms, pirates, knights, wizards and other challenges on the field. 
 
GAME FEATURES: 
★ Fun gameplay with many unique enemies and maps. 
★ Beautiful graphics and animations. 
★ 40 different enemies, from Orcs to Bats each with their own skills. 
★ 25 upgrades ready to boost you power. 
★ 25 unique maps with various themes. 
★ 20 towers are at your command. 
★ 3 unique difficulty modes for each map . 
★ Special abilities for additional fire power. 
★ Collectable bonus coins on levels. 
★ Unique tower defense strategy.
